Timeless Investments, Lasting

Investing in India has become more transparent, secure, and rewarding with strengthened regulations like RERA and GST. Rattha Realty offers NRIs an exclusive portfolio of ultra-luxury residences, seamlessly blending sophistication, convenience, and long-term value.

PLANNING TO BUY A HOME?
ESSENTIAL FACTORS TO KEEP IN MIND

Buying a Home?
Key Factors to Consider

Verify Property Ownership & Title Clarity

Verify ownership, disputes, and mortgage release for property title.

Choose a Trusted Developer

Choose a credible developer; check past work, quality, and reliability.

Compare Market Alternatives

Compare local projects; assess pricing, amenities, and growth potential.

Conduct a Comprehensive Legal Check

Hire a property lawyer to verify ownership, claims, permits, and agreements.

Confirm Regulatory Approvals & Compliance

Confirm project approvals and builder’s authority for land transfer.

Evaluate Financial & Investment Prospects

Ensure legal clarity, verify documents, and assess investment potential.

guide to NRI BUYING PROPERTY IN INDIA

Navigate the process with ease and make informed decisions with our expert guide tailored for NRIs.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Can NRIs invest in real estate in India?

What documents are required for an NRI to purchase property in India?

How can NRIs manage their property from abroad?

What are the tax implications for NRIs investing in Indian real estate?

Can NRIs rent out their properties in India?

Can an NRI sell property in India and repatriate the funds?

Is it mandatory for NRIs to visit India for property transactions?

What legal due diligence should NRIs conduct before investing?
